text: 21.9: Sng 118.25-26 naŋga, Mt 23.39Kamatɨndɨ krunavundi Jisasɨndu kasiram ndambu umu ndaŋɨnɨŋ naŋga sɨhɨndɨ payɨmu nɨŋɨnɨŋ, sɨhanaŋga nɨmavamba taŋguvɨhumu, Devit Nɨŋuñɨŋgirɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨm. Kru Aru nɨmandu ñɨmbiyɨ payɨmi nɨmaŋ, Got nuŋ avindamam. Got kɨmbayɨndu sɨkwɨ nɨmarɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨm, vamu.
